text: Lumen Technologies, Inc. (formerly CenturyLink) is an American company from Monroe, Louisiana. It provides internet, cable television and telephone service to many areas of the United States. The original names for the company were the Oak Ridge Telephone Company, Central Telephone, and Century Telephone. CenturyLink was established in 1930 in Oak Ridge, Louisiana. CenturyLink completed a merger with Qwest on Friday, April 1, 2011. CenturyLink was the surviving company. CenturyLink won two "Best in Class" awards in 2011. ==References== Category:20th-century establishments in Louisiana Category:1930 establishments in the United States Category:American telephone companies Category:American internet service providers Category:Companies based in Louisiana
title: Lumen Technologies
